title: Commission Directive 90/623/EEC of 7 November 1990 amending Annex II to Council Directive 66/402/EEC on the marketing of cereal seed
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 7 November 1990
amending Annex II to Council Directive 66/402/EEC on the marketing of cereal seed
( 90/623/EEC )
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In section ( 2 ) ( B ) ( d ) of Annex II to Directive 66/402/EEC, "30 June 1990' is replaced by "31 December 1992 '.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States .
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 November 1990 .
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
( 1 ) OJ No 125, 11 . 7 . 1966, p . 2309/66 .
( 2 ) OJ No L 5, 7 . 1 . 1989, p . 31 .
( 3 ) OJ No L 274, 6 . 10 . 1988, p . 44 .
